name.ja: 究極のサウンドブースター

short.am,ar,bg,bn,hu,ta: Increase the audio volume in YouTube videos, control the volume with one click! Enjoy high-quality sound for videos and music
short.ca: Amplifiqueu fàcilment l'àudio per a música, vídeos i trucades directament al vostre navegador. Obteniu un so clar i de gran volum…
short.cs: Snadno zesilte zvuk pro hudbu, videa a hovory přímo ve vašem prohlížeči. Získejte jasný, vysoký zvuk jen jedním kliknutím!
short.da: Forstærk nemt lyd til musik, videoer og opkald direkte i din browser. Få klar, høj lyd med bare et klik!
short.de: Verstärken Sie ganz einfach die Audioqualität für Musik, Videos und Anrufe direkt in Ihrem Browser. Erhalten Sie klaren Klang mit…
short.el,et,fil,ml,te: Experience crystal clear, high sound for music, videos, and calls with just one click! Amplify your sound effortlessly in your…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,hi,kn,ms,ru,sw,th,u: Easily amplify sound for music, videos, and calls directly in your browser. Increase the volume with just one click!
short.es,es_419: Amplifique fácilmente el audio para música, vídeos y llamadas directamente en su navegador. ¡Obtenga un sonido claro y alto con…
short.fa,he,hr,id,mr,ro,sr,vi: Increase the audio volume on YouTube videos with one click! Instantly control video and music volume in separate tabs.
short.fi: Vahvista ääntä helposti musiikille, videoille ja puheluille suoraan selaimessasi. Saat selkeän, suuren äänen vain yhdellä…
short.fr: Améliorez facilement le son de la musique, des vidéos et des appels directement dans votre navigateur. Obtenez un son clair en un…
short.gu: Increase the audio volume of YouTube videos, increase sound with one click! Increase video volume, instantly increase music volume,…
short.it: Migliora facilmente l'audio per musica, video e chiamate direttamente nel tuo browser. Ottieni un suono chiaro con un solo clic!
short.ja: ブラウザ内で音楽、ビデオ、通話のオーディオを簡単に増幅します。クリック一つでクリアで高音量のサウンドを得ることができます！
short.ko: 브라우저 내에서 음악, 비디오, 통화 오디오를 쉽게 증폭시키십시오. 한 번의 클릭으로 명확하고 큰 소리를 얻으십시오!
short.lt: Lengvai sustiprinkite audio muzikai, video ir skambučiams tiesiogiai savo naršyklėje. Gaukite aiškų, didelio garso garsą tik vienu…
short.lv: Vienkārši pastipriniet audio mūzikai, video un zvaniem tieši savā pārlūkā. Iegūstiet skaidru, augstu skaņu tikai ar vienu klikšķi!
short.nl: Verbeter eenvoudig het geluid voor muziek, video's en oproepen, rechtstreeks in uw browser. Krijg helder geluid met slechts één…
short.no: Forsterk enkelt lyd for musikk, videoer og samtaler direkte i nettleseren din. Få klar, høyvolumslyd med bare ett klikk!
short.pl: Łatwo wzmacniaj dźwięk dla muzyki, filmów i rozmów bezpośrednio w swojej przeglądarce. Uzyskaj czysty, głośny dźwięk za pomocą…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Aumente facilmente o áudio de músicas, vídeos e chamadas diretamente no seu navegador. Obtenha um som nítido com apenas um clique!
short.sk: Jednoducho zosilnite zvuk pre hudbu, videá a hovory priamo vo vašom prehliadači. Získajte jasný zvuk s vysokou hlasitosťou len…
short.sl: Z lahkoto ojačajte zvok za glasbo, videoposnetke in klice neposredno v vašem brskalniku. Dobi jasen, visok zvok z le enim klikom!
short.sv: Förstärk enkelt ljud för musik, videor och samtal direkt i din webbläsare. Få klart, högt ljud med bara ett klick!
short.tr: Tarayıcınızda doğrudan müzik, videolar ve aramalar için sesi kolayca yükseltin. Sadece bir tıklama ile net, yüksek ses alın!
short.zh_CN: 轻松在您的浏览器中放大音乐，视频和通话的音频。只需一键，就可以获得清晰，高音量的声音！
short.zh_TW: 輕鬆在您的瀏覽器中放大音樂，視頻和通話的音頻。只需點擊一下，就可以獲得清晰，高音量的聲音！

long.ar,bg,bn,el,et,fa,fil,gu,he,hr,hu,id,ml,:
Try volume max, a simple browser add-on for sound level control. With volume max, making your browser's sound louder or softer is quick and easy. Need more sound for music, videos, or web games? Just one click does it. The volume tool is easy – just slide to change.

Volume max does more than just set audio levels. It boosts your audio too. It makes sound louder but still clear. You can turn up the sound higher than what your browser usually allows. volume max keeps the louder sound nice and clear.

It's a chore to change sound for each site. volume max makes it easy. It changes the sound level based on the site you're on. Go from a loud video site to a quiet blog, and volume max changes the sound for you.

If you like to set things your way, volume max lets you. You can pick sound levels for videos, music, and alerts. This means your browsing sounds just how you like.

Volume max has a quick-use icon on your toolbar. Change the sound right there, no need to open full settings. This is great for quick sound tweaks.

The design of volume max is neat and user-friendly. It's simple, with just a sound slider and a boost button. No complex settings, just easy sound control.

Sound safety matters in volume max. It tells you when the sound is too high for your ears. You can even set a sound limit to keep your hearing safe.

In short, sound max is a must-have browser add-on for easy sound control. It's simple, quick, and perfect for daily web use. For small sound changes or a big boost, volume max is your tool. Upgrade your web audio with sound max.

Sound booster also remembers your settings. Once you set the volume for a site, it stays that way. Next time you visit, volume booster automatically sets the volume to your preference. This means less fiddling with volume controls every time.

Volume booster is perfect for all sorts of users. Whether you're watching videos, listening to music, or playing games, it ensures your volume is just right. It's especially useful for those who keep multiple tabs open. You can have different volume levels for each tab, no mix-up.

Trouble hearing a quiet video? audio booster's boost function can help. It makes quiet sounds louder, so you won't miss a thing. And if a site is too loud, just turn the volume down with a click. It's all about having control over your browser's sound.

Volume booster is lightweight and won't slow down your browser. It runs smoothly, ensuring your browsing experience stays fast and enjoyable. Plus, it's free to use. Just add it to your browser, and you're set for better sound control.

In case you're worried about ads or privacy, sound booster is safe. It doesn't track your browsing or show annoying ads. Your browsing stays private, and your screen stays clean.

Sound booster is easy to install. Just go to your browser's extension store, search for volume booster, and click 'Add'. In seconds, you'll have a powerful yet simple volume control tool right in your browser.

To wrap up, sound booster transforms your browser's volume control. It's straightforward, versatile, and enhances your audio experience. With volume booster, managing sound is no longer a hassle. It's a breeze. Try audio booster today and take control of your browser's volume like never before.

Beyond basic sound control, sound master also offers custom audio profiles. Set a quiet profile for reading or a louder one for videos. Switching profiles is easy, and volume master applies your chosen sound level instantly. This feature is great for quick changes without adjusting the slider each time.

Volume master is not just for personal use. It's ideal for shared spaces too. If you're in a library or office, you can keep your volume low. At home, boost it up for a richer sound. audio master adapts to your environment, giving you the right volume always.

For parents, volume master offers peace of mind. Control the volume on your kids' devices to ensure they're not listening too loud. It's a simple way to keep their hearing safe while they browse, play, or watch online.

Volume master's interface is user-friendly, even for those not tech-savy. The design is clean, with big, easy-to-see buttons. Adjusting volume is straightforward, making it accessible for all ages. It's perfect for anyone who wants hassle-free sound control.

The extension also features a mute button. Silence all tabs with one click, perfect for quickly stopping sound when needed. Unmuting is just as easy, bringing back your set volume levels.

Volume master is always up-to-date. Regular updates keep it running smoothly and add new features based on user feedback. These updates ensure that volume master stays useful and effective for controlling your browser's volume.

In sumary, volume master is a versatile, user-friendly browser extension for managing volume. Whether for personal, work, or family use, it offers easy and effective volume control. Simple to install and free of charge, volume master enhances your browsing experience with perfect sound levels. Try volume master now and experience the ease of refined sound control in your browser.

Volume Chrome Tool

In our web world, volume are key. When you stream a song, join a web call, or watch a clip, the its volume matter a lot. A new Chrome add-on now changes how we manage volume online.

Meet the Chrome Tool for Volume. It's easy to use and helps you control volume on any site. This tool is a must for better volume in your Chrome browser.

Volume booster lets you take charge of sound. With a few clicks, you can set volume just right. You get the best volume for each sound. Volume booster is easy to use, so anyone can get the hang of it fast.

A top feature of this sound booster is how it can lift volume. If you've had issues with low sound or volume in videos or tracks, this tool is a big help. It can boost volume high, making sure each sound is clear. This is great for those who need loud sound.

The sound booster design is simple. It fits right into your Chrome bar, so you can get to volume controls fast. You use a slider to change volume, making it easy to adjust.

The tool works on all sites. This means you can manage volume the same way for videos, tunes, and games. This makes things easy, as you don't need different tools for sound.

Also, the volume booster remembers your sound volume for each site. Set your volume once, and the tool keeps it that way each time you go back. This makes browsing with your own volume a breeze.

For tech fans, the volume booster has more to offer. You can set up volume for different times, like soft volume for night or loud sound for a workout. This lets you match sound to what you do or feel.

Safe and private use of sound booster is key for this tool. It needs few permissions and keeps your web use safe. This sound booster is all about better volume while keeping your data safe.

In short, the Volume control tool for Volume is vital for a better sound experience online. It's simple, effective, and has lots of features for sound. Whether you need more volume for a quiet video or want to tweak sound, this tool has it all. Get clear, tailored volume with this smart Chrome add-on.

long.ca:
Proveu aquest reforç de volum, un complement senzill del navegador per controlar el nivell de so. Amb l'amplificador de volum, fer que el so del navegador sigui més fort o més suau és ràpid i fàcil. Necessites més volum per a música, vídeos o jocs web? Només un clic ho fa. L'eina de volum és fàcil: només cal que utilitzeu el control lliscant per canviar.

El nostre reforç de so fa més que establir nivells de so. També augmenta el vostre àudio. Fa que l'àudio sigui més fort però encara clar. Podeu augmentar el so més alt que el que normalment permet el vostre navegador. Ara podeu mantenir l'àudio més fort agradable i clar.

És una tasca canviar el so per a cada lloc. Ho posem fàcil. La finestra emergent mostra una llista de tots els llocs on es reprodueix el so, només cal que feu clic al que necessiteu i ajusteu el volum al nivell desitjat.

Si t'agrada posar el volum a la teva manera, pots fer-ho. Podeu triar els nivells de so per a cada pestanya amb vídeos, música i alertes. Això vol dir que la teva navegació sona tal com t'agrada.

Canviar ràpidament el volum des de la barra d'eines mai ha estat tan fàcil!. Canvieu el nivell d'àudio allà mateix, no cal obrir la configuració completa. Això és ideal per ajustar el so ràpid.

El disseny del controlador de volum és net i fàcil d'utilitzar. És senzill, amb només un control lliscant de so i un botó de restabliment. Sense configuració complexa, només control d'àudio fàcil.

Tingueu en compte la seguretat dels altaveus mitjançant el control de volum. Un augment excessiu del volum pot danyar els altaveus. Gestioneu amb cura els nivells d'àudio per evitar danyar el sistema de so del vostre dispositiu.

En resum, aquest és un complement del navegador imprescindible per a un fàcil control del nivell d'àudio. És senzill, ràpid i perfecte per a l'ús web diari. Per a petits canvis de so o un gran augment de volum. Actualitza el teu so web amb un reforç de so fàcil d'utilitzar

Rychlá změna hlasitosti z panelu nástrojů nebyla nikdy jednodušší!. Změňte lvl zvuku přímo tam, není třeba otevírat úplné nastavení. To je skvělé pro rychlé úpravy zvuku.

Tehokas äänenvoimakkuuden vahvistin voi nostaa äänenvoimakkuuden 600 %:iin kaikilla online-ääni- ja videomediaalustoilla, mukaan lukien YouTube, Amazon Prime ja Disney. Lisäksi voit säätää äänenvoimakkuutta kätevällä liukusäätimellä.

Äänenvoimakkuuden tehostin on rakennettu tarjoamaan dynaaminen mutta hallittu äänenvoimakkuuden lisäys. Estämme haitallista piikitystä, jotta kuuntelu ei väsytä. Lisäksi taajuuskorjaus tarkoittaa, että voit lisätä äänenvoimakkuutta ilman vääristymiä. (Toisin kuin jotkut muut äänenvahvistimet).

Kuinka äänenvoimakkuuden tehostimet parantavat selaimesi ääntä? Sivustojen äänitiedostot, jopa ne, jotka on merkitty "korkealaatuisiksi", sisältävät joitain kompromisseja. Osa alkuperäisistä tiedoista poistetaan, jotta tiedostoa olisi helpompi hallita. Kun kuuntelet musiikkia, vielä enemmän, 1:tä ja 0:a leikataan pois, jotta se toimitetaan nopeasti. Näin ollen suosikkikappaleesi muuttuvat litteiksi, tylsiksi ja elottomiksi.

Tässä on äänenvoimakkuuden tehostin. Se auttaa tarjoamalla parhaan mahdollisen lähetyksen ohjaamalla aktiivisen selainvälilehden mediavirtoja. Sitten voit käyttää liukusäädintä lisätäksesi äänivirran äänenvoimakkuutta ja palauttaaksesi musiikkisi oikeaan muotoonsa.

Äänenvoimakkuuden lisäyslaajennus on kätevä, jos käytät suurimman osan kannettavan tietokoneen ja pöytätietokoneen videosisällöstä.

Tässä on joitain äänenvahvistimen kriittisiä ominaisuuksia:

YouTube-äänenvahvistin
Se lisää myös YouTube-videoiden ääntä. Voit säätää äänenvoimakkuutta, vaikka järjestelmän ääni olisi asetettu maksimiin. Tätä työkalua voidaan käyttää äänenvoimakkuuden lisäämiseen jopa 600 % sekä Windowsissa että Macissa.

Netflixin äänenvoimakkuuden tehostin
Netflix on yksi tunnetuimmista OTT-alustoista, ja se on suosittu, jota vietämme katsomiseen muutamasta minuutista useisiin tunteihin. Valitettavasti pöytäkoneen tai kannettavan tietokoneen alhaiset kaiuttimien äänenvoimakkuudet voivat aiheuttaa ongelmia Netflixin kanssa.

Amazon Prime -äänenvahvistin
Äänitehostin toimii kaikkien tärkeimpien median suoratoistoalustojen kanssa, mukaan lukien Amazon Prime. Tätä laajennusta voidaan käyttää myös Amazon Primen kanssa.

Kuinka asennat ja käytät äänenvoimakkuutta?
* Asenna äänenvahvistin latauspainikkeesta
* Kiinnitä äänivahvistin nopeaa käyttöä varten
* Toista mitä tahansa videota tai ääntä
* Ota laajennus käyttöön napsauttamalla kuvaketta
* Säädä äänitasoja helposti liukusäätimellä

Ominaisuudet:
* Nosta ääntä yli maksimiarvon - vahvista jopa 600 % kaikista selaimen mediatiedostoista.

* Erittäin helppokäyttöinen - voit säätää minkä tahansa välilehden äänenvoimakkuutta selaimesi ponnahdusliukusäätimellä.

* Ei äänen vääristymistä – äänenvoimakkuuden tehostin tarkkailee jatkuvasti nykyistä vahvistustasoa ja estää näytteitä leikkaamasta, mikä vähentää kaikkia merkittäviä äänen vääristymiä.

Prestare attenzione alla sicurezza degli altoparlanti utilizzando il controllo del volume. Aumenti eccessivi del volume possono danneggiare gli altoparlanti. Gestisci con attenzione i livelli audio per evitare di danneggiare il sistema audio del tuo dispositivo.

In breve, questo è un componente aggiuntivo del browser indispensabile per un facile controllo del livello audio. È semplice, veloce e perfetto per l'uso quotidiano del web. Per piccoli cambiamenti nel suono o un grande aumento del volume. Migliora il tuo audio web con un controllo del suono facile da usare.

サウンド レベルを制御するためのシンプルなブラウザ アドオンであるこのボリューム ブースターをお試しください。 ボリューム ブースターを使用すると、ブラウザのサウンドを大きくしたり小さくしたりすることがすばやく簡単にできます。 音楽、ビデオ、Web ゲームの音量をもっと上げたいですか? ワンクリックするだけで完了します。 音量ツールは簡単です。スライダーを使用して変更するだけです。

当社のサウンド ブースターは、サウンド レベルを設定するだけではありません。 オーディオもブーストされます。 音声が大きくなりますが、それでもクリアです。 ブラウザで通常許可されている音よりも高くすることができます。 これで、より大きな音声を美しくクリアに保つことができます。

サイトごとにサウンドを変更するのは面倒です。 それを簡単にします。 ポップアップには、サウンドが再生されるすべてのサイトのリストが表示されます。必要なサイトをクリックして、音量を希望のレベルに調整するだけです。

音量を自分好みに設定したい場合は、それを行うことができます。 ビデオ、音楽、アラートのタブごとにサウンド レベルを選択できます。 これは、ブラウジングが好みどおりに聞こえることを意味します。

ツールバーから音量を素早く変更するのがかつてないほど簡単になりました。 オーディオレベルをその場で変更できるため、完全な設定を開く必要はありません。 これはサウンドを素早く調整するのに最適です。

ボリュームコントローラーのデザインはすっきりしていて使いやすいです。 スライダーとリセットボタンだけでシンプルです。 複雑な設定は必要なく、簡単にオーディオをコントロールできます。

音量コントロールを使用する場合は、スピーカーの安全に注意してください。 音量を上げすぎるとスピーカーに損傷を与える可能性があります。 デバイスのサウンド システムに損傷を与えないように、オーディオ レベルを慎重に管理してください。

つまり、これはオーディオレベルを簡単に制御するために必須のブラウザアドオンです。 シンプルかつ迅速で、日常的なウェブ使用に最適です。 小さなサウンド変化や大きなブーストボリュームに。 使いやすいサウンド コントロールで Web サウンドをアップグレードします。

Try volume max, a simple browser add-on for sound level control. With volume max, making your browser's sound louder or softer is quick and easy. Need more sound for music, videos, or web games? Just one click does it. The volume tool is easy – just slide to change.

Volume max does more than just set audio levels. It boosts your audio too. It makes sound louder but still clear. You can turn up the sound higher than what your browser usually allows. volume max keeps the louder sound nice and clear.

It's a chore to change sound for each site. volume max makes it easy. It changes the sound level based on the site you're on. Go from a loud video site to a quiet blog, and volume max changes the sound for you.

If you like to set things your way, volume max lets you. You can pick sound levels for videos, music, and alerts. This means your browsing sounds just how you like.

Volume max has a quick-use icon on your toolbar. Change the sound right there, no need to open full settings. This is great for quick sound tweaks.

The design of volume max is neat and user-friendly. It's simple, with just a sound slider and a boost button. No complex settings, just easy sound control.

Sound safety matters in volume max. It tells you when the sound is too high for your ears. You can even set a sound limit to keep your hearing safe.

In short, sound max is a must-have browser add-on for easy sound control. It's simple, quick, and perfect for daily web use. For small sound changes or a big boost, volume max is your tool. Upgrade your web audio with sound max.

Sound booster also remembers your settings. Once you set the volume for a site, it stays that way. Next time you visit, volume booster automatically sets the volume to your preference. This means less fiddling with volume controls every time.

Volume booster is perfect for all sorts of users. Whether you're watching videos, listening to music, or playing games, it ensures your volume is just right. It's especially useful for those who keep multiple tabs open. You can have different volume levels for each tab, no mix-up.

Trouble hearing a quiet video? audio booster's boost function can help. It makes quiet sounds louder, so you won't miss a thing. And if a site is too loud, just turn the volume down with a click. It's all about having control over your browser's sound.

Volume booster is lightweight and won't slow down your browser. It runs smoothly, ensuring your browsing experience stays fast and enjoyable. Plus, it's free to use. Just add it to your browser, and you're set for better sound control.

In case you're worried about ads or privacy, sound booster is safe. It doesn't track your browsing or show annoying ads. Your browsing stays private, and your screen stays clean.

Sound booster is easy to install. Just go to your browser's extension store, search for volume booster, and click 'Add'. In seconds, you'll have a powerful yet simple volume control tool right in your browser.

To wrap up, sound booster transforms your browser's volume control. It's straightforward, versatile, and enhances your audio experience. With volume booster, managing sound is no longer a hassle. It's a breeze. Try audio booster today and take control of your browser's volume like never before.

Beyond basic sound control, sound master also offers custom audio profiles. Set a quiet profile for reading or a louder one for videos. Switching profiles is easy, and volume master applies your chosen sound level instantly. This feature is great for quick changes without adjusting the slider each time.

Volume master is not just for personal use. It's ideal for shared spaces too. If you're in a library or office, you can keep your volume low. At home, boost it up for a richer sound. audio master adapts to your environment, giving you the right volume always.

For parents, volume master offers peace of mind. Control the volume on your kids' devices to ensure they're not listening too loud. It's a simple way to keep their hearing safe while they browse, play, or watch online.

Volume master's interface is user-friendly, even for those not tech-savy. The design is clean, with big, easy-to-see buttons. Adjusting volume is straightforward, making it accessible for all ages. It's perfect for anyone who wants hassle-free sound control.

The extension also features a mute button. Silence all tabs with one click, perfect for quickly stopping sound when needed. Unmuting is just as easy, bringing back your set volume levels.

Volume master is always up-to-date. Regular updates keep it running smoothly and add new features based on user feedback. These updates ensure that volume master stays useful and effective for controlling your browser's volume.

In sumary, volume master is a versatile, user-friendly browser extension for managing volume. Whether for personal, work, or family use, it offers easy and effective volume control. Simple to install and free of charge, volume master enhances your browsing experience with perfect sound levels. Try volume master now and experience the ease of refined sound control in your browser.

Volume Chrome Tool

In our web world, volume are key. When you stream a song, join a web call, or watch a clip, the its volume matter a lot. A new Chrome add-on now changes how we manage volume online.

Meet the Chrome Tool for Volume. It's easy to use and helps you control volume on any site. This tool is a must for better volume in your Chrome browser.

Volume booster lets you take charge of sound. With a few clicks, you can set volume just right. You get the best volume for each sound. Volume booster is easy to use, so anyone can get the hang of it fast.

A top feature of this sound booster is how it can lift volume. If you've had issues with low sound or volume in videos or tracks, this tool is a big help. It can boost volume high, making sure each sound is clear. This is great for those who need loud sound.

The sound booster design is simple. It fits right into your Chrome bar, so you can get to volume controls fast. You use a slider to change volume, making it easy to adjust.

The tool works on all sites. This means you can manage volume the same way for videos, tunes, and games. This makes things easy, as you don't need different tools for sound.

Also, the volume booster remembers your sound volume for each site. Set your volume once, and the tool keeps it that way each time you go back. This makes browsing with your own volume a breeze.

For tech fans, the volume booster has more to offer. You can set up volume for different times, like soft volume for night or loud sound for a workout. This lets you match sound to what you do or feel.

Safe and private use of sound booster is key for this tool. It needs few permissions and keeps your web use safe. This sound booster is all about better volume while keeping your data safe.

In short, the Volume control tool for Volume is vital for a better sound experience online. It's simple, effective, and has lots of features for sound. Whether you need more volume for a quiet video or want to tweak sound, this tool has it all. Get clear, tailored volume with this smart Chrome add-on.

사운드 레벨 제어를 위한 간단한 브라우저 추가 기능인 이 볼륨 부스터를 사용해 보세요. 볼륨 부스터를 사용하면 브라우저의 소리를 더 크게 또는 더 작게 만드는 것이 빠르고 쉽습니다. 음악, 비디오 또는 웹 게임에 더 많은 볼륨이 필요합니까? 클릭 한 번이면 됩니다. 볼륨 도구는 쉽습니다. 슬라이더를 사용하여 변경하면 됩니다.

우리의 사운드 부스터는 단순히 사운드 레벨을 설정하는 것 이상의 기능을 수행합니다. 오디오도 향상됩니다. 오디오는 더 커지지만 여전히 선명합니다. 브라우저가 일반적으로 허용하는 것보다 더 높은 사운드를 높일 수 있습니다. 이제 더 큰 오디오를 깔끔하고 선명하게 유지할 수 있습니다.

사이트마다 사운드를 바꾸는 것이 번거롭습니다. 우리는 그것을 쉽게 만듭니다. 팝업에는 사운드가 재생되는 모든 사이트 목록이 표시됩니다. 필요한 사이트를 클릭하고 볼륨을 원하는 수준으로 조정하세요.

원하는 대로 볼륨을 설정하고 싶다면 그렇게 할 수 있습니다. 비디오, 음악 및 알림이 포함된 각 탭의 사운드 레벨을 선택할 수 있습니다. 이는 귀하가 원하는 방식으로 탐색 소리가 들린다는 것을 의미합니다.

도구 모음에서 빠르게 볼륨을 변경하는 것이 그 어느 때보다 쉬워졌습니다!. 전체 설정을 열 필요 없이 바로 오디오 레벨을 변경하세요. 이는 빠른 사운드 조정에 적합합니다.

볼륨 컨트롤러의 디자인은 깔끔하고 사용자 친화적입니다. 슬라이더와 재설정 버튼만 있으면 간단합니다. 복잡한 설정이 필요 없으며 오디오 제어가 간편합니다.

볼륨 조절을 사용하여 스피커 안전에 유의하십시오. 볼륨을 과도하게 높이면 스피커가 손상될 수 있습니다. 장치의 사운드 시스템이 손상되지 않도록 오디오 레벨을 주의 깊게 관리하십시오.

간단히 말해서, 이것은 쉬운 오디오 레벨 제어를 위한 필수 브라우저 추가 기능입니다. 간단하고 빠르며 일상적인 웹 사용에 적합합니다. 작은 사운드 변화 또는 큰 부스트 볼륨용. 사용하기 쉬운 사운드 컨트롤로 웹 사운드를 업그레이드하세요.

long.lt:
Išbandykite šį garsumo stiprintuvą – paprastą naršyklės priedą garso lygiui valdyti. Naudojant garsumo stiprintuvą, naršyklės garsą garsinti ar švelninti galima greitai ir paprastai. Reikia daugiau muzikos, vaizdo įrašų ar interneto žaidimų garsumo? Tai padaro vos vienu paspaudimu. Garsumo įrankis yra paprastas – tiesiog naudokite slankiklį, kad pakeistumėte.

Mūsų garso stiprintuvas ne tik nustato garso lygius. Tai taip pat pagerina jūsų garsą. Tai daro garsą garsesnį, bet vis tiek aiškų. Galite padidinti garsą nei įprastai leidžia jūsų naršyklė. Dabar galite išlaikyti garsesnį garsą gražiai ir aiškiai.

Pakeisti kiekvienos svetainės garsą yra darbas. Mes tai palengviname. Iššokančiajame lange rodomas visų svetainių, kuriose grojamas garsas, sąrašas, tiesiog spustelėkite reikiamą ir sureguliuokite garsumą iki norimo lygio

Jei norite nustatyti garsumą savo būdu, galite tai padaryti. Galite pasirinkti garso lygius kiekvienam skirtukui su vaizdo įrašais, muzika ir įspėjimais. Tai reiškia, kad jūsų naršymas skamba taip, kaip jums patinka.

Greitai pakeisti garsumą įrankių juostoje dar niekada nebuvo taip paprasta!. Pakeiskite garso LVL čia pat, nereikia atidaryti visų nustatymų. Tai puikiai tinka greitam garso koregavimui.

Garsumo valdiklio dizainas yra tvarkingas ir patogus naudoti. Tai paprasta, tereikia slankikliu ir atstatymo mygtuku. Jokių sudėtingų nustatymų, tik paprastas garso valdymas.

Atkreipkite dėmesį į garsiakalbių saugumą naudodami garsumo valdiklį. Per didelis garsumo padidėjimas gali pakenkti jūsų garsiakalbiams. Atsargiai valdykite garso lygius, kad nesugadintumėte įrenginio garso sistemos.

Trumpai tariant, tai yra būtinas naršyklės priedas, skirtas lengvam garso LVL valdymui. Tai paprasta, greita ir puikiai tinka kasdieniam naudojimui žiniatinklyje. Mažiems garso pokyčiams arba dideliam garsumo padidinimui. Atnaujinkite savo žiniatinklio garsą naudodami paprastą garso valdymą.

long.lv:
Izmēģiniet šo skaļuma pastiprinātāju — vienkāršu pārlūkprogrammas papildinājumu skaņas līmeņa kontrolei. Izmantojot skaļuma pastiprinātāju, pārlūkprogrammas skaņas padarīšana skaļāka vai maigāka ir ātra un vienkārša. Vai nepieciešams lielāks skaļums mūzikai, videoklipiem vai tīmekļa spēlēm? To paveic tikai viens klikšķis. Skaļuma rīks ir vienkāršs — vienkārši izmantojiet slīdni, lai to mainītu.

Mūsu skaņas pastiprinātājs dara vairāk nekā tikai skaņas līmeņu iestatīšanu. Tas uzlabo arī jūsu audio. Tas padara skaņu skaļāku, bet joprojām skaidru. Varat iestatīt augstāku skaņu, nekā to parasti atļauj jūsu pārlūkprogramma. Tagad varat saglabāt skaļāku skaņu jauku un skaidru.

Skaņas maiņa katrai vietnei ir grūts darbs. Mēs to atvieglojam. Uznirstošais logs parāda visu vietņu sarakstu, kurās tiek atskaņota skaņa, vienkārši noklikšķiniet uz vajadzīgās un noregulējiet skaļumu vēlamajā līmenī

Ja vēlaties iestatīt skaļumu sev piemērotā veidā, varat to izdarīt. Varat izvēlēties skaņas līmeni katrai cilnei ar videoklipiem, mūziku un brīdinājumiem. Tas nozīmē, ka jūsu pārlūkošana skan tieši tā, kā jums patīk.

Ātri mainīt skaļumu no rīkjoslas nekad nav bijis tik vienkārši! Turpat nomainiet audio LVL, nav jāatver pilni iestatījumi. Tas ir lieliski piemērots ātrai skaņas korekcijai.

Skaļuma regulatora dizains ir glīts un lietotājam draudzīgs. Tas ir vienkārši, tikai ar slīdni un atiestatīšanas pogu. Nav sarežģītu iestatījumu, tikai vienkārša audio vadība.

Ņemiet vērā skaļruņu drošību, izmantojot skaļuma regulēšanu. Pārmērīgs skaļuma palielinājums var kaitēt jūsu skaļruņiem. Uzmanīgi pārvaldiet audio līmeņus, lai nesabojātu ierīces skaņas sistēmu.

Īsāk sakot, šis ir obligāts pārlūkprogrammas papildinājums ērtai audio LVL kontrolei. Tas ir vienkāršs, ātrs un lieliski piemērots ikdienas lietošanai tīmeklī. Mazām skaņas izmaiņām vai lielam skaļuma palielinājumam. Uzlabojiet savu tīmekļa skaņu ar viegli lietojamu skaņas vadību.

Probeer deze volumebooster, een eenvoudige browseradd-on om uw audioniveaus te regelen. Met Volume Booster kunt u uw browser snel en eenvoudig luider of stiller laten klinken. Heeft u meer volume nodig voor muziek, video's of webgames? Eén klik volstaat. De volumetool is eenvoudig: gebruik gewoon de schuifregelaar om te wijzigen.

Onze audioversterker doet meer dan alleen het instellen van audioniveaus. Het verbetert ook je geluid. Het geluid wordt luider, maar blijft helder. U kunt het geluid hoger zetten dan uw browser normaal toestaat. Nu kunt u luidere audio mooi en helder houden.

Het veranderen van het geluid voor elke site is een vervelende klus. Wij maken het gemakkelijk. Een pop-upvenster toont een lijst met alle sites die audio afspelen. Klik gewoon op de gewenste site en pas het volume aan op het gewenste niveau.

Als u het volume op uw eigen manier wilt aanpassen, kunt u dat doen. U kunt audioniveaus kiezen voor elk tabblad met video's, muziek en meldingen. Dit betekent dat uw kijkervaring klinkt zoals u dat wilt.

Het volume snel wijzigen via de werkbalk was nog nooit zo eenvoudig! Wijzig hier het audioniveau. U hoeft niet de volledige instellingen te openen. Dit is geweldig voor het snel instellen van uw audio.

Het ontwerp van de volumeregeling is netjes en handig. Het is eenvoudig, alleen een geluidsschuifregelaar en een resetknop. Geen ingewikkelde instellingen, alleen eenvoudige audiobediening.

Houd rekening met de veiligheid van de luidsprekers wanneer u de volumeregeling gebruikt. Overmatige volumeverhogingen kunnen uw luidsprekers beschadigen. Pas de audioniveaus zorgvuldig aan om schade aan het geluidssysteem van uw apparaat te voorkomen.

Kortom, dit is een onmisbare browser-add-on waarmee u eenvoudig uw audioniveaus kunt regelen. Het is eenvoudig, snel en ideaal voor dagelijks internetgebruik. Voor kleine geluidsveranderingen of het verhogen van het volume. Verbeter uw webaudio met een gebruiksvriendelijke audioversterker
long.no:
Prøv denne volumforsterkeren, et enkelt nettlesertillegg for lydnivåkontroll. Med volumforsterker er det raskt og enkelt å gjøre nettleserens lyd høyere eller mykere. Trenger du mer volum for musikk, videoer eller nettspill? Bare ett klikk gjør det. Volumverktøyet er enkelt – bare bruk glidebryteren for å endre.

Vår lydforsterker gjør mer enn bare å stille inn lydnivåer. Det øker lyden din også. Det gjør lyden høyere, men likevel tydelig. Du kan skru opp lyden høyere enn hva nettleseren din vanligvis tillater. Nå kan du holde den høyere lyden fin og klar.

Det er et ork å endre lyd for hvert nettsted. Vi gjør det enkelt. Pop-up viser en liste over alle nettsteder der lyden spilles av, bare klikk på den du trenger og juster volumet til ønsket nivå

Hvis du liker å stille inn volumet på din måte, kan du gjøre det. Du kan velge lydnivåer for hver fane med videoer, musikk og varsler. Dette betyr at nettlesingen din høres ut akkurat slik du vil.

Det har aldri vært enklere å raskt endre volum fra verktøylinjen! Endre lydnivået der, du trenger ikke å åpne fullstendige innstillinger. Dette er flott for raske lydjusteringer.

Utformingen av volumkontrolleren er ryddig og brukervennlig. Det er enkelt, med bare en glidebryter og en tilbakestillingsknapp. Ingen komplekse innstillinger, bare enkel lydkontroll.

Vær oppmerksom på høyttalersikkerhet ved å bruke volumkontroll. Overdreven volumøkning kan skade høyttalerne. Håndter lydnivåene nøye for å unngå å skade enhetens lydsystem.

Kort sagt, dette er et må-ha nettlesertillegg for enkel lydnivåkontroll. Det er enkelt, raskt og perfekt for daglig nettbruk. For små lydendringer eller et stort boostvolum. Oppgrader nettlyden din med brukervennlig lydkontroll.

long.pl:
Wypróbuj ten wzmacniacz głośności, prosty dodatek do przeglądarki umożliwiający kontrolę poziomu dźwięku. Dzięki funkcji zwiększania głośności zwiększanie lub zmniejszanie głośności dźwięku przeglądarki jest szybkie i łatwe. Potrzebujesz większej głośności muzyki, filmów lub gier internetowych? Wystarczy jedno kliknięcie, aby to zrobić. Narzędzie do regulacji głośności jest proste — wystarczy użyć suwaka, aby to zmienić.

Nasz wzmacniacz dźwięku potrafi więcej niż tylko ustawia poziom dźwięku. Poprawia także dźwięk. Dzięki temu dźwięk jest głośniejszy, ale nadal wyraźny. Możesz zwiększyć dźwięk, niż zwykle pozwala na to Twoja przeglądarka. Teraz możesz sprawić, że głośniejszy dźwięk będzie przyjemny i wyraźny.

Zmiana dźwięku w każdej witrynie jest zadaniem trudnym. Ułatwiamy to. Wyskakujące okienko wyświetla listę wszystkich witryn, na których odtwarzany jest dźwięk, wystarczy kliknąć tę, której potrzebujesz i dostosować głośność do żądanego poziomu

Jeśli chcesz ustawić głośność na swój sposób, możesz to zrobić. Możesz wybrać poziom dźwięku dla każdej karty z filmami, muzyką i alertami. Oznacza to, że przeglądanie brzmi dokładnie tak, jak lubisz.

Szybka zmiana głośności z paska narzędzi nigdy nie była łatwiejsza! Zmień poziom dźwięku od razu, nie ma potrzeby otwierania pełnych ustawień. Świetnie nadaje się do szybkich poprawek dźwięku.

Konstrukcja regulatora głośności jest schludna i przyjazna dla użytkownika. To proste, wystarczy suwak i przycisk resetowania. Żadnych skomplikowanych ustawień, po prostu łatwe sterowanie dźwiękiem.

Należy pamiętać o bezpieczeństwie głośników, korzystając z regulacji głośności. Nadmierne zwiększenie głośności może uszkodzić głośniki. Ostrożnie zarządzaj poziomami dźwięku, aby uniknąć uszkodzenia systemu dźwiękowego urządzenia.

Krótko mówiąc, jest to niezbędny dodatek do przeglądarki, umożliwiający łatwą kontrolę poziomu dźwięku. Jest prosty, szybki i idealny do codziennego korzystania z Internetu. Do małych zmian dźwięku lub dużego wzmocnienia głośności. Ulepsz swój dźwięk w Internecie dzięki łatwej w użyciu kontroli dźwięku.

É uma tarefa árdua mudar o som de cada site. Nós facilitamos. Pop-up exibe uma lista de todos os sites onde o som é reproduzido, basta clicar naquele que você precisa e ajustar o volume para o nível desejado

Se você gosta de definir o volume do seu jeito, você pode fazer isso. Você pode escolher os níveis de som para cada guia com vídeos, músicas e alertas. Isso significa que sua navegação soa exatamente como você gosta.

Alterar rapidamente o volume na barra de ferramentas nunca foi tão fácil! Altere o nível de áudio ali mesmo, sem necessidade de abrir as configurações completas. Isso é ótimo para ajustes rápidos de som.

long.sk:
Vyskúšajte tento zosilňovač hlasitosti, jednoduchý doplnok prehliadača na ovládanie úrovne zvuku. So zosilňovačom hlasitosti je rýchle a jednoduché zosilniť alebo zjemniť zvuk vášho prehliadača. Potrebujete väčšiu hlasitosť pre hudbu, videá alebo webové hry? Stačí jedno kliknutie. Nástroj na nastavenie hlasitosti je jednoduchý – na zmenu stačí použiť posúvač.

Náš zosilňovač zvuku dokáže viac než len nastaviť úrovne zvuku. Zosilňuje aj váš zvuk. Zvuk je hlasnejší, ale stále čistý. Zvuk môžete zosilniť na vyššiu úroveň, než akú zvyčajne umožňuje váš prehliadač. Teraz si môžete ponechať hlasnejší zvuk pekný a čistý.

Je to fuška zmeniť zvuk pre každú stránku. Uľahčíme to. Pop-up zobrazí zoznam všetkých stránok, na ktorých sa zvuk prehráva, stačí kliknúť na ten, ktorý potrebujete a upraviť hlasitosť na požadovanú úroveň

Ak chcete nastaviť hlasitosť podľa seba, môžete to urobiť. Môžete si vybrať úrovne zvuku pre každú kartu s videami, hudbou a upozorneniami. To znamená, že vaše prehliadanie znie presne tak, ako sa vám páči.

Rýchla zmena hlasitosti z panela nástrojov nebola nikdy jednoduchšia!. Zmeňte úroveň zvuku priamo tam, nie je potrebné otvárať úplné nastavenia. To je skvelé pre rýchle úpravy zvuku.

Dizajn ovládača hlasitosti je prehľadný a užívateľsky prívetivý. Je to jednoduché, len s posúvačom a resetovacím tlačidlom. Žiadne zložité nastavenia, len jednoduché ovládanie zvuku.

Majte na pamäti bezpečnosť reproduktorov pomocou ovládania hlasitosti. Nadmerné zvýšenie hlasitosti môže poškodiť vaše reproduktory. Starostlivo spravujte úrovne zvuku, aby ste predišli poškodeniu zvukového systému vášho zariadenia.

Stručne povedané, toto je nevyhnutný doplnok prehliadača pre jednoduché ovládanie lvl zvuku. Je to jednoduché, rýchle a ideálne na každodenné používanie na webe. Pre malé zmeny zvuku alebo veľké zvýšenie hlasitosti. Inovujte svoj webový zvuk pomocou jednoduchého ovládania zvuku.

Try volume max, a simple browser add-on for sound level control. With volume max, making your browser's sound louder or softer is quick and easy. Need more sound for music, videos, or web games? Just one click does it. The volume tool is easy – just slide to change.

Volume max does more than just set audio levels. It boosts your audio too. It makes sound louder but still clear. You can turn up the sound higher than what your browser usually allows. volume max keeps the louder sound nice and clear.

It's a chore to change sound for each site. volume max makes it easy. It changes the sound level based on the site you're on. Go from a loud video site to a quiet blog, and volume max changes the sound for you.

If you like to set things your way, volume max lets you. You can pick sound levels for videos, music, and alerts. This means your browsing sounds just how you like.

Volume max has a quick-use icon on your toolbar. Change the sound right there, no need to open full settings. This is great for quick sound tweaks.

The design of volume max is neat and user-friendly. It's simple, with just a sound slider and a boost button. No complex settings, just easy sound control.

Sound safety matters in volume max. It tells you when the sound is too high for your ears. You can even set a sound limit to keep your hearing safe.

In short, sound max is a must-have browser add-on for easy sound control. It's simple, quick, and perfect for daily web use. For small sound changes or a big boost, volume max is your tool. Upgrade your web audio with sound max.

Sound booster also remembers your settings. Once you set the volume for a site, it stays that way. Next time you visit, volume booster automatically sets the volume to your preference. This means less fiddling with volume controls every time.

Volume booster is perfect for all sorts of users. Whether you're watching videos, listening to music, or playing games, it ensures your volume is just right. It's especially useful for those who keep multiple tabs open. You can have different volume levels for each tab, no mix-up.

Trouble hearing a quiet video? audio booster's boost function can help. It makes quiet sounds louder, so you won't miss a thing. And if a site is too loud, just turn the volume down with a click. It's all about having control over your browser's sound.

Volume booster is lightweight and won't slow down your browser. It runs smoothly, ensuring your browsing experience stays fast and enjoyable. Plus, it's free to use. Just add it to your browser, and you're set for better sound control.

In case you're worried about ads or privacy, sound booster is safe. It doesn't track your browsing or show annoying ads. Your browsing stays private, and your screen stays clean.

Sound booster is easy to install. Just go to your browser's extension store, search for volume booster, and click 'Add'. In seconds, you'll have a powerful yet simple volume control tool right in your browser.

To wrap up, sound booster transforms your browser's volume control. It's straightforward, versatile, and enhances your audio experience. With volume booster, managing sound is no longer a hassle. It's a breeze. Try audio booster today and take control of your browser's volume like never before.

Beyond basic sound control, sound master also offers custom audio profiles. Set a quiet profile for reading or a louder one for videos. Switching profiles is easy, and volume master applies your chosen sound level instantly. This feature is great for quick changes without adjusting the slider each time.

Volume master is not just for personal use. It's ideal for shared spaces too. If you're in a library or office, you can keep your volume low. At home, boost it up for a richer sound. audio master adapts to your environment, giving you the right volume always.

For parents, volume master offers peace of mind. Control the volume on your kids' devices to ensure they're not listening too loud. It's a simple way to keep their hearing safe while they browse, play, or watch online.

Volume master's interface is user-friendly, even for those not tech-savy. The design is clean, with big, easy-to-see buttons. Adjusting volume is straightforward, making it accessible for all ages. It's perfect for anyone who wants hassle-free sound control.

The extension also features a mute button. Silence all tabs with one click, perfect for quickly stopping sound when needed. Unmuting is just as easy, bringing back your set volume levels.

Volume master is always up-to-date. Regular updates keep it running smoothly and add new features based on user feedback. These updates ensure that volume master stays useful and effective for controlling your browser's volume.

In sumary, volume master is a versatile, user-friendly browser extension for managing volume. Whether for personal, work, or family use, it offers easy and effective volume control. Simple to install and free of charge, volume master enhances your browsing experience with perfect sound levels. Try volume master now and experience the ease of refined sound control in your browser.

Volume Chrome Tool

In our web world, volume are key. When you stream a song, join a web call, or watch a clip, the its volume matter a lot. A new Chrome add-on now changes how we manage volume online.

Meet the Chrome Tool for Volume. It's easy to use and helps you control volume on any site. This tool is a must for better volume in your Chrome browser.

Volume booster lets you take charge of sound. With a few clicks, you can set volume just right. You get the best volume for each sound. Volume booster is easy to use, so anyone can get the hang of it fast.

A top feature of this sound booster is how it can lift volume. If you've had issues with low sound or volume in videos or tracks, this tool is a big help. It can boost volume high, making sure each sound is clear. This is great for those who need loud sound.

The sound booster design is simple. It fits right into your Chrome bar, so you can get to volume controls fast. You use a slider to change volume, making it easy to adjust.

The tool works on all sites. This means you can manage volume the same way for videos, tunes, and games. This makes things easy, as you don't need different tools for sound.

Also, the volume booster remembers your sound volume for each site. Set your volume once, and the tool keeps it that way each time you go back. This makes browsing with your own volume a breeze.

For tech fans, the volume booster has more to offer. You can set up volume for different times, like soft volume for night or loud sound for a workout. This lets you match sound to what you do or feel.

Safe and private use of sound booster is key for this tool. It needs few permissions and keeps your web use safe. This sound booster is all about better volume while keeping your data safe.

In short, the Volume control tool for Volume is vital for a better sound experience online. It's simple, effective, and has lots of features for sound. Whether you need more volume for a quiet video or want to tweak sound, this tool has it all. Get clear, tailored volume with this smart Chrome add-on.

Preizkusite ta ojačevalnik glasnosti, preprost dodatek za brskalnik za nadzor glasnosti. Z ojačevalnikom glasnosti je zvok brskalnika glasnejši ali tišji hitro in enostavno. Potrebujete več glasnosti za glasbo, videe ali spletne igre? To naredi le en klik. Orodje za glasnost je preprosto – za spreminjanje uporabite le drsnik.

Naš ojačevalnik zvoka omogoča več kot le nastavitev ravni zvoka. Izboljša tudi vaš zvok. Zvok postane glasnejši, a še vedno jasen. Zvok lahko povečate višje, kot običajno omogoča vaš brskalnik. Zdaj lahko glasnejši zvok ohranite lep in jasen.

Spreminjanje zvoka za vsako spletno mesto je težko delo. Mi olajšamo. V pojavnem oknu se prikaže seznam vseh spletnih mest, na katerih se predvaja zvok, samo kliknite tisto, ki jo potrebujete, in nastavite glasnost na želeno raven

Če želite glasnost nastaviti po svoje, lahko to storite. Izberete lahko ravni zvoka za vsak zavihek z videoposnetki, glasbo in opozorili. To pomeni, da vaše brskanje zveni tako, kot želite.

Hitro spreminjanje glasnosti iz orodne vrstice še nikoli ni bilo lažje!. Tam spremenite raven zvoka, ni vam treba odpreti celotnih nastavitev. To je super za hitro prilagajanje zvoka.

Zasnova regulatorja glasnosti je lična in uporabniku prijazna. Preprosto je, samo z drsnikom in gumbom za ponastavitev. Brez zapletenih nastavitev, le enostaven nadzor zvoka.

Z nadzorom glasnosti bodite pozorni na varnost zvočnikov. Prekomerno povečanje glasnosti lahko poškoduje vaše zvočnike. Previdno upravljajte ravni zvoka, da ne poškodujete zvočnega sistema vaše naprave.

Skratka, to je dodatek brskalnika, ki ga morate imeti za enostaven nadzor ravni zvoka. Je preprost, hiter in popoln za vsakodnevno spletno uporabo. Za majhne spremembe zvoka ali veliko povečanje glasnosti. Nadgradite svoj spletni zvok s preprostim nadzorom zvoka.

Prova denna volymförstärkare, ett enkelt webbläsartillägg för ljudnivåkontroll. Med volymförstärkare är det snabbt och enkelt att göra webbläsarens ljud högre eller mjukare. Behöver du mer volym för musik, videor eller webbspel? Bara ett klick gör det. Volymverktyget är enkelt – använd bara reglaget för att ändra.

Vår ljudförstärkare gör mer än att bara ställa in ljudnivåer. Det förstärker ditt ljud också. Det gör ljudet högre men ändå tydligt. Du kan höja ljudet högre än vad din webbläsare vanligtvis tillåter. Nu kan du hålla det starkare ljudet snyggt och tydligt.

Det är jobbigt att byta ljud för varje sida. Vi gör det enkelt. Popup-fönster visar en lista över alla sajter där ljud spelas, klicka bara på den du behöver och justera volymen till önskad nivå

Om du gillar att ställa in volymen på ditt sätt kan du göra det. Du kan välja ljudnivåer för varje flik med videor, musik och varningar. Det betyder att din surfning låter precis som du vill.

Att snabbt ändra volym från verktygsfältet har aldrig varit enklare!. Ändra ljudnivån där, du behöver inte öppna fullständiga inställningar. Detta är bra för snabba ljudjusteringar.

Utformningen av volymkontrollern är snygg och användarvänlig. Det är enkelt, med bara ett reglage och en återställningsknapp. Inga komplicerade inställningar, bara enkel ljudkontroll.

Var uppmärksam på högtalarnas säkerhet med hjälp av volymkontroll. Överdrivna volymhöjningar kan skada dina högtalare. Hantera ljudnivåerna noggrant för att undvika att skada din enhets ljudsystem.

Kort sagt, detta är ett måste-ha webbläsartillägg för enkel ljudnivåkontroll. Det är enkelt, snabbt och perfekt för daglig webbanvändning. För små ljudförändringar eller en stor boostvolym. Uppgradera ditt webbljud med lättanvänd ljudkontroll.

Ses seviyesi kontrolü için basit bir tarayıcı eklentisi olan bu ses yükselticiyi deneyin. Ses yükseltici ile tarayıcınızın sesini daha yüksek veya daha yumuşak hale getirmek hızlı ve kolaydır. Müzik, video veya web oyunları için daha fazla ses seviyesine mi ihtiyacınız var? Sadece tek bir tıklama bunu yapar. Ses seviyesi aracı kolaydır; değiştirmek için kaydırıcıyı kullanmanız yeterlidir.

Ses yükselticimiz ses seviyelerini ayarlamaktan daha fazlasını yapar. Aynı zamanda sesinizi de artırır. Sesi daha yüksek ama yine de net hale getirir. Sesi, tarayıcınızın genellikle izin verdiğinden daha yüksek bir seviyeye yükseltebilirsiniz. Artık daha yüksek sesi güzel ve net tutabilirsiniz.

Her site için sesi değiştirmek bir angaryadır. Bunu kolaylaştırıyoruz. Açılır pencerede sesin çalındığı tüm sitelerin bir listesi görüntülenir; yalnızca ihtiyacınız olan siteye tıklayın ve ses seviyesini istediğiniz seviyeye ayarlayın

Sesi kendi yönteminize göre ayarlamak isterseniz bunu yapabilirsiniz. Videolar, müzik ve uyarılar içeren her sekme için ses seviyelerini seçebilirsiniz. Bu, taramanızın tam istediğiniz gibi olduğu anlamına gelir.

Araç çubuğundan ses seviyesini hızla değiştirmek hiç bu kadar kolay olmamıştı!. Ses seviyesini hemen oradan değiştirin, tüm ayarları açmanıza gerek yok. Bu, hızlı ses ayarlamaları için harikadır.

Ses kontrol cihazının tasarımı düzgün ve kullanıcı dostudur. Yalnızca bir kaydırıcı ve bir sıfırlama düğmesiyle basittir. Karmaşık ayarlar yok, yalnızca kolay ses kontrolü.

Ses seviyesi kontrolünü kullanırken hoparlör güvenliğine dikkat edin. Aşırı ses seviyesi artışları hoparlörlerinize zarar verebilir. Cihazınızın ses sistemine zarar vermemek için ses seviyelerini dikkatli bir şekilde yönetin.

Kısacası bu, kolay ses seviyesi kontrolü için sahip olunması gereken bir tarayıcı eklentisidir. Basit, hızlı ve günlük web kullanımı için mükemmeldir. Küçük ses değişiklikleri veya büyük ses yükseltme için. Kullanımı kolay ses kontrolüyle web sesinizi yükseltin.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
試試這個音量增強器，一個用於聲級控制的簡單瀏覽器插件。 使用音量增強器，可以快速輕鬆地使瀏覽器的聲音更大或更小。 需要更大的音量來播放音樂、影片或網頁遊戲？ 只需輕輕一按即可完成。 音量工具很簡單 - 只需使用滑桿即可更改。

我們的聲音增強器的作用不僅僅是設定聲音等級。 它還可以增強您的音訊。 它使音訊聲音更大但仍然清晰。 您可以將聲音調至高於瀏覽器通常允許的音量。 現在您可以保持響亮的音訊優美而清晰。
